architecture.summary: AI Memory Layer - שכבת זיכרון persistent ל-AI assistants. מאפשר ל-Claude/Cursor/Copilot לזכור errors, solutions, decisions והקשר בין sessions.
key_flows: Session Start: init_session -> load project context -> warm start
Error Capture: Browser extension -> Flask API -> error_store -> dedup
Solution Search: search_past_solutions -> semantic engine -> find similar
Memory Update: update_live_record -> save to project JSON
Multi-Project: switch_project -> isolated memory per directory
architecture.stack: Python (Flask), FastMCP, JavaScript (Browser Extension), HTML/CSS Dashboard, SQLite
architecture.description: AI Memory Layer - מערכת שמעניקה ל-AI זיכרון persistent בין sessions
architecture.purpose: AI Memory Layer - persistent error tracking for AI assistants

intent.current_goal: Protocol v5 - הוספת RULE #6: USE Insights

insights: capabilities section בדף הטסט הציג כלי MCP שלא קיים (check_new_errors) - עודכן לכלים הנוכחיים
Added a new button ("כפתור חדש") to tests/test-site/index.html and styled it with a blue outline, in addition to the existing "בדיקת Cursor" button.

Implemented Project Boundary Detection System - auto-switches to new project when file written outside active project. Uses confidence levels (high=.git, medium=strong marker, low=skip). Anti-ping-pong prevents auto-switch-back.

Session init (auto_init_session, init_session) now uses boundary detection as single source of truth. Detects actual project root from cwd, compares against active project, triggers boundary transition if needed BEFORE returning project context.
Fixed find_project_root to handle non-existent files (new files being written). Now walks up from parent directory if file doesn't exist yet.
